name: elm-cli-options-parser
description: Parse CLI options declaritively in Elm.

scripts.approve: elm-make --docs=documentation.json && cd examples && elm-make src/ElmTest.elm && elm-make src/Git.elm && elm-make src/Graphqelm.elm src/Simple.elm && elm-make src/Validation.elm && elm-make src/Curl.elm && elm-make src/Grep.elm && cd -
scripts.build: cd examples && elm-make src/*.elm --output src/elm.js && cd -

author: Dillon Kearns
